Package UI

Class BoardUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BoardUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class BoardUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class creates the UI for the game. It implements Serializable interface to support serialization.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardUI

      public BoardUI​(javax.swing.JFrame frame, Token token)
      Constructor for the BoardUI class, representing the user interface for the game board. Initializes arrays for circleMatrix and buttonList, and sets up the game using the specified JFrame and Token.
      Parameters:
      frame - The JFrame for the game UI.
      token - The initial Token for the game.

    • BoardUI

      public BoardUI​(javax.swing.JFrame frame, Game game)
      Constructor for the BoardUI class, representing the user interface for the game board. Initializes arrays for circleMatrix and buttonList, and sets up the game using the specified JFrame and Game.
      Parameters:
      frame - The JFrame for the game UI.
      game - The Game object representing the current state of the game.

  • Method Details

    • getGame

      public static Game getGame()

    • setGame

      public static void setGame​(Game game)

    • Init

      public void Init​(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
      Initializes the game board UI based on the current state of the game. Updates the visibility of pieces and sets labels accordingly.
      Parameters:
      frame - The JFrame for the game UI.

    • inic

      public void inic​(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
      Additional initialization for the game board UI. (aka. does everything) Sets up background image, buttons, save button, and error labels.
      Parameters:
      frame - The JFrame for the game UI.

    • botTurn

      public void botTurn​(Game game)
      Executes the bot's turn in the game. The bot places or moves its pieces based on its game state.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.

    • botFly

      public boolean botFly​(Game game, int randomNumberFrom)
      Attempts to perform a flying move for the bot.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      randomNumberFrom - The randomly chosen position to fly from.
      Returns:
      True if the flying move is successful, false otherwise.

    • botMove

      public boolean botMove​(Game game, int randomNumberFrom)
      Attempts to perform a normal move for the bot.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      randomNumberFrom - The randomly chosen position to move from.
      Returns:
      True if the normal move is successful, false otherwise.

    • botDelete

      public void botDelete​(Game game)
      Deletes a piece on the board for the bot.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.

    • fly

      public void fly​(Game game, Player player, int index)
      Handles the flying action for a player's piece on the board.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      player - The player who is performing the flying action.
      index - The index of the position where the flying action is initiated.

    • move

      public void move​(Game game, Player player, int index)
      Handles the movement action for a player's piece on the board.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      player - The player who is performing the movement action.
      index - The index of the position where the movement action is initiated.

    • delete

      public void delete​(Game game, Player player)
      Handles the deletion of a player's piece from the board.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      player - The player whose piece is being deleted.

    • ableToMove

      public static boolean ableToMove​(Game game, Player player, int k)
      Checks if a player is able to move a piece to an adjacent position.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      player - The player attempting to move a piece.
      k - The index of the position from which the piece is being moved.
      Returns:
      True if the player is able to move a piece, false otherwise.

    • ifWin

      public static int ifWin​(Game game)
      Checks if a player has won the game or if the game is still ongoing.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      0 if the game is still ongoing, 1 if Player 1 has won, and 2 if Player 2 has won.

    • ifWon

      public void ifWon​(Game game)
      Checks if a player has won the game and displays a corresponding message.
      Parameters:
      game - The game object representing the current state of the game.

    • specialPieceInic

      public void specialPieceInic​(java.awt.Frame frame)
      Initializes and configures combo boxes for selecting piece types (Normal or Special) for both players. Allows players to choose the type of piece they want to place on the board.
      Parameters:
      frame - The Frame instance associated with the game.

    • comboBoxRefresh

      public void comboBoxRefresh​(Player player, Game game)
      Refreshes the combo box options for selecting piece types, removing "Special piece" if the special piece is already on the board for the given player. This method is used to update the combo box options when a player places a special piece on the board.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom to refresh the combo box.
      game - The Game instance representing the current game state.

    • comboBoxRefreshNormal

      public void comboBoxRefreshNormal​(Player player, Game game)
      Refreshes the combo box options for selecting piece types, removing "Normal piece" if the player has 8 normal pieces on the board and no special piece. This method is used to update the combo box options when a player has placed all normal pieces on the board.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom to refresh the combo box.
      game - The Game instance representing the current game state.

    • botHandler

      public void botHandler​(Game game)
      Handles the bot's turn by selecting a special piece for Player 2 and hiding the corresponding combo box. This method is called during the bot's turn to simulate the selection of a special piece and update the UI.
      Parameters:
      game - The Game instance representing the current game state.
